replies.body:
Why is flash on d?
Flash on f gang rise up
I'm actually so hyped for this.
tldr im probs never gonna play this champ.
same lmao
NIce! Really interesting Champion and it's my main role adc too, an adc with 10 abilities!
Classic example of OVERACHIEVING. Whoever developed this champion must have been on some GOOD STUFF. I just want to know WHY? and WHO let this happen? I'm suing.

Aphelios got more guns than Illaoi and Darius combined!!

Almost as mechanically complex as Garen too! {{champion:86}}
Can't wait to get stomped by intro bots as i work out wtf im doing
rito u better be carefull ur gonna run out of gimmicks, champ sounds epic tho
i hate u tam

Atleast let him have the ability to get rid of a weapon he  doesnt need with a high mana cost... like wtf what if u get a bad weapon?? u need to aa and Q like 100-150 times inorder to get what you need thats assuming the enemy is dumb enough to engage you when you have it.... they can just sit back and wait till u use up all the ammo of that weapon and then the cycle repeats........
You can swap between two weapons already and im pretty sure mana cost doesnt change as he changes weapon so i doubt that'll be a problem.
yea but 3 of his weapons interact with his offhand weapon when in the main-hand(the boomerang, flamethrower and gravity gun) so you need the right main hand and off hand to get a good synergy
It's so easy to get through a gun quickly and to pace yourself through the guns though. It's just part of the champ
I agree I don't to end up stuck on the flamethrower when sh*t hits the fan
Riot, stop, just stop. This is unnessessary, stop it, champions should not be this complex, what is going on?

If you have a kit so fucked that you need a new hud then there a problem and the fact that riot doesn't realise that is so stupid. Give a champ 10 abilities see what happens, they cant even  balance  the high skill-cap champions they already have so why introduce another one

Is this a out of season April fools joke? 
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
LOL
Looks fun, cant wait to try it :)
Finally riot is atleast trying to get on par with DotA heroes.
hella cool, Great Job Riot. Lot of guns recently with senna and now Aphelia it would be cool if you could make a new champion like zed but is more focused on gap closers and cc
Hey remember when we all complained about Kai'Sa being overloaded? We weren't giving you a challenge Riot.
yoo I'm ready 4 big brain plays lol I'm probably gonna get shit on by Aphelios players but fk I will enjoy it {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
This Ryze rework looks cool! Thanks Riot!!

Looks really, really fun! Well done on the creativity, whoever created this champion must have an amazing imagination! My kinda gal/guy, thanks for keeping things interesting. Can't wait to see all the amazing gameplay to come with this champ.

So he has extra range on autos,increased attack Damage, attack Speed scaling with  Bonus Armor Penetration in built, a (portion) asuming % based healing that can also be used as a sheild when overhealing (bloodthirster) and a flat heal, increase attack speed, a ROOT a SLOW, WAVE CLEAR AOE, A TURRET and damage buffs on autos. 

Why does riot keep making these champs that are never gonna be balanced. Also just making older champions just irrelevant. like you can only rework a few champs a year. Dont you think this is just volatile for the game? Gimmie a basic champ with ONE or TWO intricate details. This after a while may not be hard to master but BOY OH BOY will it suck to be balanced. Its gonna be Trash or Broken no in between

Summary: broken or trash, too much shit

p.s: idc about the amount of abilities i played invoker on dota 2 he has more abilties than this guy, but i know for sure he is gonna be trash or broken with all the heals,root,sheilds etc...
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} Well done riot
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
Wasn't part of the reason for the Ori rework back in the day because she was too complex? And now you're going to throw mister 2 or 3 skills (x5?) and a new HUD in the mix?
> **__**{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{sticker:sg-ahri-3}} {{sticker:sg-lux-2}} {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}} {{sticker:cass-cry}}
so he's basicly wallmart brand invoker mixed with all the insane mechanics they couldn't add to other champs. as a good man once said, "to defeat the bullsh*t, one must become the bullsh*t"
Wht the fuck is that shit this ain't mobile legends ok riot
I agree I don't to end up stuck on the flamethrower when sh*t hits the fan
Top class shitpost.
